item.title: [HADOOP-11637] bash location hard-coded in shell scripts
item.description: Let's fix all of the /bin/bash and /usr/bin/bash hardcodes globally in the shell code in one big patch.
item.summary: bash location hard-coded in shell scripts

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
